creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: patterned strips stitched together; multicolored--predominately orange and blue; strips have either wide green and pink or red stripes, or wide blue and narrow white stripes, alternating with multicolored striped bands with some patterns; each end has orange and yellow lines alternating with diamond or lozenge patterning; fringe on short ends
title: Wrapper
